translation.en: ♪ Hey ♪
[Alan] You know, this Lamaze class got me concerned.
translation.it: La lezione di Lamaze mi ha messo ansia.

translation.en: Is there really a chance that you're gonna stop breathin' while givin' birth?
translation.it: Potresti smettere di respirare durante il parto?

translation.en: -What? -Like everything is going great,
translation.it: Tutto va alla grande e io dico: "Uno, due, tre"

translation.en: and I'm like, "One, two, three," and your face turns blue,
translation.it: Tutto va alla grande e io dico: "Uno, due, tre" e tu diventi blu e smetti di respirare e io dico: "Respira!"

translation.en: and you stop breathing, I'm like, "Breathe! Breathe!" [laughs]
translation.it: e tu diventi blu e smetti di respirare e io dico: "Respira!"

translation.en: Alan, it's about us being ready.
translation.it: Alan, si tratta di essere pronti.

translation.en: It's about us doing this together.
Well, you know, girl, doing this together is what got us here in the first place.
translation.it: Beh, cara, è facendolo insieme che siamo a questo punto.

translation.en: Except your breathing was more like, "Oh, Alan!
translation.it: Ma lì tu eri più: - "Oh, Alan! Fantastico!" - Alan!

translation.en: -Oh, it's amazing!" -Alan.
-"Oh, Alan, it's so big!" -Alan!
-"It's so big!" -Stop it! You're being ridiculous!
Oh, I gotta get back to work. It's the last day before maternity leave.
translation.it: Devo andare al lavoro. È l'ultimo giorno prima del congedo.

translation.en: -I'm gonna miss work. -Yeah, I wish I could say the same.
-Linda's on a warpath. -Oh.
Apparently, Doug pitched a new holiday e-card, and it didn't go so well.
translation.it: Il biglietto d'auguri lanciato da Doug è andato male.

translation.en: Babe, who's gonna send an e-card for someone graduating from rehab for the second time?
translation.it: Chi manda due volte gli auguri per aver finito la riabilitazione?

translation.en: Well, it was a lot better than "Happy Hoe-loween". You know, for women that wear slutty costumes.
translation.it: Meglio di "Bel costume da troia" per chi si veste succinta ad Halloween.

translation.en: Or what about "White Kwanzaa," which makes absolutely no sense at all.
translation.it: O "Kwanzaa bianco," che non ha assolutamente senso.

translation.en: And don't forget to tell Linda you're taking paternity leave.
translation.it: Parla a Linda del congedo di paternità.

translation.en: I know. Listen, nothing's more important to me than my family,
translation.it: Lo so. Niente è più importante della mia famiglia,

translation.en: not even a partnership
at the company I've been busting my ass for all these years.
translation.it: dopo essermi fatto il culo per anni.

translation.en: You think maybe I should've just slept my way to the top?
translation.it: Dovevo andare a letto col capo?

translation.en: Okay, babe. I'll see you later.
Don't think Linda want it? You see the way Linda looks at your boy!
translation.it: Linda non vorrebbe? - Sai come mi guarda! - Non m'importa.

translation.en: -Not interested in that conversation. -Don't be jealous.
translation.it: - Sai come mi guarda! - Non m'importa. Non essere gelosa.

translation.en: -I love you. -[Marie] Love you, too.
Bye.
Linda, I wanna apologize for the pitch.
translation.it: Mi scuso per il nuovo prodotto.

translation.en: You know, I've been delegating more to the team, and I want...
translation.it: E ho delegato più lavoro alla squadra...

translation.en: Y-You know, 'cause the baby's due soon--
I know you got a lot on your plate, Alan.
translation.it: So che hai molto da fare, Alan.

translation.en: I won't pretend to understand, I never wanted babies. Ick!
translation.it: Non fingo di capire, non ho mai voluto figli.

translation.en: [stammers] You know, um...
I-I-I don't usually drink at work.
translation.it: Di solito non bevo al lavoro.

translation.en: -[slurps] -Oh, damn.
Alan. There was a time when you took charge.
translation.it: Alan. Un tempo prendevi in mano la situazione.

translation.en: You were aggressive. You dressed the part.
You were becoming the face of this company, literally!
Now... everything's about...
translation.it: Ora tutto ruota intorno al bambino.

translation.en: Linda, that's what I wanted to talk to you about.
translation.it: Proprio di questo ti volevo parlare.

translation.en: [stammers] I'm gonna be taking some time off.
-What? -Just a month or so.
It's like paternity leave.
[Linda] Paternity leave?!
You're in line for a partnership.
Do you really think, Alan, this is the right time to vacay?
translation.it: Ti sembra il momento giusto di andare in vacanza?

translation.en: It's not a vacay. I just want to be there for my family.
translation.it: Non vacanza. Voglio esserci per la mia famiglia.

translation.en: And you know what? That partnership, I earned it.
translation.it: Mi sono guadagnato la possibilità di diventare socio.

translation.en: Now, I have a baby appointment, and I promised Marie I'd be there.
translation.it: C'è un'ecografia e ho promesso a Marie che ci sarei stato.

translation.en: [Linda] Fine!
[mocking] Go to your little appointment with your sonogram and your gel.
translation.it: Vai all'appuntamento con l'ecografia e il gel.

translation.en: [Dr. Greenberg] Everything looks great.
Right where you'd expect to be at 35 weeks.
-[Marie chuckles] -Thank you. Lights, please.
Now, because of your advanced maternal age--
translation.it: A causa della tua età materna avanzata...

translation.en: Uh, I'm only 35.
-And 35 is really 15 in Black-people age. -Mm-hmm.
You know that black don't crack...
[both] ...unless you smoke it. Okay?
translation.it: - a meno che non lo fumino. - Già.

translation.en: Sure, but 35 is still considered an elevated risk pregnancy.
translation.it: Certo. Ma a 35 è comunque una gravidanza a rischio elevato.

translation.en: -Uh, no pre-eclampsia in your family? -No.
translation.it: - Casi di preeclampsia in famiglia? - No.

translation.en: -No food allergies? No history of cancer? -No.
No, she has A-plus genes.
You know, her daddy's a federal judge.
translation.it: Suo padre è un giudice federale.

translation.en: She graduated top of her class at Columbia Law,
translation.it: Si è diplomata alla Columbia Law School

translation.en: and she's the first female partner in her firm.
translation.it: ed è la prima socia donna del suo studio.

translation.en: Hey, Doc... I trapped her.
-Uh, one more thing... -[Marie] Hmm?
Alan... we don't have your family history.
translation.it: Alan, non abbiamo la tua anamnesi familiare.

translation.en: Oh, well, there's a perfectly good explanation for that. I don't have one.
translation.it: C'è un'ottima spiegazione. Non ce l'ho.

translation.en: See, I was put up for adoption, and I was raised in foster homes.
I moved around a lot. I never really met my birth mother. Hence, no family medical history.
translation.it: Ne ho cambiate molte. Non so chi sia mia madre. È questo il motivo.

translation.en: [Marie] But... he checked out great after his last physical.
translation.it: Ma... l'ultima visita medica è andata alla grande.

translation.en: That's right. You are lookin' at one perfect human specimen.
translation.it: Esatto. Ha davanti un essere umano perfetto.

translation.en: Now, what more could you ask for?
translation.it: Cosa si può chiedere di più?

translation.en: Girl!
-Look at that! -[Marie laughs]
-Little baby gonna come out buff. [grunts] -[growls]
[Alan] Why can't they just put it in the chart,
"Don't know family medical history"?
She has to ask. She's not judging you, baby.
translation.it: Chiede per prassi. Non ti giudica, tesoro.

translation.en: So what if I don't know if my family has high blood pressure or diabetes,
translation.it: E se non so se i miei hanno la pressione alta o il diabete, o il gene delle dita

translation.en: or the gene that gives you the little webby thing between your toes
translation.it: la pressione alta o il diabete, o il gene delle dita dei piedi attaccate che non ti fa mettere le infradito?

translation.en: that makes it impossible to wear flip-flops?
translation.it: dei piedi attaccate che non ti fa mettere le infradito?

translation.en: Listen, black people don't even wear flip-flops.
translation.it: I neri neanche mettono le infradito.

translation.en: You're right, baby, we don't.
Makes our heel hard and our baby toe ashy.
translation.it: Vengono i talloni duri e i mignoli pallidi.

translation.en: You know, and I've tried every DNA website there is.
translation.it: Ho provato su ogni sito di DNA.

translation.en: I mean, all I found out was I may be related to Cleopatra...
translation.it: Ho scoperto solo che potrei essere parente di Cleopatra

translation.en: and I'm 1/23 Irish.
Alan, my father is a federal circuit judge.
translation.it: Alan, mio padre è un giudice federale.

translation.en: I've told you this a million times. He'd be happy to help you find your family.
translation.it: Te l'ho detto mille volte. Ti aiuterebbe a trovare la tua famiglia.

translation.en: No. No, Marie.
That man don't like me.
He stopped liking you after you started liking me.
translation.it: Non gli piaci più da quando ti piaccio io.

translation.en: I don't wanna owe that man anything.
translation.it: Non voglio avere debiti con lui.

translation.en: Look, Alan.
If this is as important to you as you say it is, now is the perfect time to ask.
translation.it: Se per te è importante quanto dici, è il momento giusto per chiedere.

translation.en: [Alan] Who has a Sunday brunch on a Saturday? Not even white folks do that.
translation.it: Chi fa il brunch domenicale di sabato? Nemmeno i bianchi lo fanno.

translation.en: [Marie] My mom insisted.
[Alan] Aw, I love your mommy. Only thing I don't like about your mommy is your daddy.
translation.it: Oh, adoro tua madre. L'unica cosa che non mi piace di lei è tuo padre.

translation.en: Surprise!
Mommy!
-Oh, my little Pooh Bear! -Oh!
Never surprise a pregnant lady. Don't y'all know that?
-Yeah, my water almost broke. -[Janet] Marie.
translation.it: Sì, mi si sono quasi rotte le acque.

translation.en: The whole family is here for you.
Really?
Your sisters, every aunt, uncle, cousin!
-Cousins, cousins, cousins. -Oh, Mom.
-This is like a Tyler Perry movie in here. -Oh, stop it.
translation.it: Sembra un film di Tyler Perry.

translation.en: [Alan] So, Doug, your date, she seems really, um...
translation.it: Allora, Doug. La tua accompagnatrice sembra molto...

translation.en: -outgoing. -Oh, yeah.
-She's a Russian aerial dancer. -[Alan] Okay.
-You know, like with ribbons? -Yeah, yeah.
That, or she's a spy.
Or maybe she's just a thief. I'm not sure.
translation.it: O forse è solo una ladra. Non lo so.

translation.en: But I'm keeping my sensitive documents in a safe just in case.
translation.it: Ma tengo i documenti riservati in cassaforte.

translation.en: Smart man.
-Doug. -Marie.
Oh, thank you so much for coming!
Oh, such a great shower!
-And these mommy-mosas are on fleek. -[Marie] Right?
-We don't say that. -Mm-mm.
Uh, off the chain.
-That's old. -No.
-They're the bomb. -[Alan and Marie] Stop.
Uh, shit, she's stealing.
-[Marie] What? -Excuse me.
So...
Dad's at the grill, so now's the perfect chance to talk to him.
translation.it: Papà è alla griglia, è l'occasione perfetta per parlargli.

translation.en: -Hey. -Hmm?
-Dad, I was... -Ooh.
Sorry. Judge...
-Mm-hmm. -[Alan] Sir.
I got something I wanted to talk to you about.
You know, I wasn't exactly in favor
of you marrying my daughter.
You kind of mentioned that during the wedding,
when the preacher said, "Speak now or forever hold your peace."
translation.it: quando il pastore diceva: "Parli ora o taccia per sempre".

translation.en: You... you didn't hold your peace.
Alan, I'm trying to make sure that you understand that you're...
you're about to become the father of my grandchild.
translation.it: Diventerai il padre di mio nipote.

translation.en: I know this. And that-- that-- Sir.
[stammering] I leased a brand new SUV.
It's red, so everybody knows it's coming.
translation.it: È rosso, così tutti lo vedono,

translation.en: Got the little "Baby On Board" sticker in the back,
and I'm almost finished with the nursery.
translation.it: e ho quasi finito la cameretta.

translation.en: I got a few finishing touches to put on, but--
-[sizzling] -[Leland] Damn it.
That's not what I'm talking about.
translation.it: Non è di questo che parlo.

translation.en: Son...
I want to share something with you.
Family is everything.
You don't have a family.
Now, Marie brings generations of success to the table.
translation.it: Ora, Marie offre generazioni di successo.

translation.en: What exactly are you bringing?
I can throw with both arms.
-You can throw with both arms? -Mm-hmm.
translation.it: - Tiri con entrambe le braccia? - Sì.

translation.en: Listen, sir.
I want to find my birth family.
But see, I need a court order to unseal my adoption records.
translation.it: Ma mi serve un mandato per accedere ai registri delle adozioni.

translation.en: -Well, just so I'm clear... -Yes.
-So I'm clear... -Mm-hmm.
You're asking me for a favor?
Not a favor. Like a... "Favor" is a big word.
translation.it: Non un favore. È una parola grossa.

translation.en: Like... adjust it. A "solid".
No, no. I wanna hear "favor." "Solid" doesn't work here.
translation.it: No. Voglio sentire "favore". Aiutino non va.

translation.en: Can we not say "favor" so hard?
translation.it: Possiamo evitare di dirlo così forte?

translation.en: "Judge, could you do me a favor?" Can you say something like that?
Can you do me a f--
Can you do me a favor?
There you go.
There you go. That wasn't that hard, was it?
translation.it: Non era poi così difficile, no?

translation.en: -It was. -It was actually easier than I thought it was going to be.
translation.it: - Sì. - È stato più facile di quanto pensassi.

translation.en: You...You know, you...
You're not much of a fighter, are you, son?
-Hmm? -No.
[Marie chuckles] What is this?
Aw! How cute is this?
Alan, look.
You know, I've been trying to get that information for years,
translation.it: Provo a ottenere queste informazioni da anni,

translation.en: and your father got it in less than an hour.
translation.it: e tuo padre l'ha fatto in meno di un'ora.

translation.en: Open it.
Marie, now... Now, once I open this, y-y-you know there's no going back.
translation.it: Una volta aperto, non si torna indietro.

translation.en: Open the damn thing!
my whole life I always wondered what my birth family was like.
translation.it: Mi sono sempre chiesto come fosse la mia famiglia.

translation.en: Where'd they come from? Were they poor? And... And they worked hard,
translation.it: Da dove venivano? Erano poveri e lavoravano sodo,

translation.en: and then they started a successful dry cleaning company, [stammers] and then they got rich,
translation.it: hanno aperto una lavanderia e sono diventati ricchi

translation.en: and they moved across town to the East side, and then they bought a deluxe apartment--
translation.it: e si sono spostati nell'East Side, hanno preso una casa di lusso...

translation.en: Alan. That's The Jeffersons.
I know, but a boy could dream.
-Just open the dag-gone thing! -Okay! Don't yell at me.
translation.it: - Aprilo e basta! - Ok! Non gridare.

translation.en: [Marie] God! Just avoiding it.
Baby, this is just stuff. I can't... I can't make nothin' of this.
translation.it: Tesoro, che roba è? Non ci capisco niente.

translation.en: Okay, okay, all right. Records of Transfer...
translation.it: Ok, va bene. Documenti di trasferimento...

translation.en: Oh, my gosh, Alan. It's your birth certificate.
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio, Alan. È il tuo certificato di nascita.

translation.en: Look.
-[Alan] Oh, sh... Marie. -[Marie chuckles]
translation.it: STATO DELLA GEORGIA CERTIFICATO DI NASCITA

translation.en: It's my birth certificate. [stammers] This is me!
translation.it: È il mio certificato di nascita. Sono io!

translation.en: Yep, all five pounds and six ounces of you.
translation.it: Sì, tutte e due i chili e 44.

translation.en: -Hey! That's a healthy baby! -That's a good baby.
-Yeah. -Yeah.
-A little slim. -Little slim.
Oh. No father on record.
translation.it: Oh. Non c'è il padre sul registro.

translation.en: Oh! Alan, look.
Your birth mother's name is right here.
translation.it: Il nome della tua madre biologica.

translation.en: Wow! You know any Lynettes?
Uh, no.
I know a Lynette. My barber, the one that cuts my hair?
translation.it: Io sì. La mia parrucchiera - si chiama Lynette! - Dai.

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -She's a Lynette!
She faded it a little high, but I think she was high when she faded it.
translation.it: Sì. Ha sfumato troppo in alto, ma era fatta, credo.

translation.en: -She did good. -Maybe my mom owns a salon!
translation.it: - Vanno bene. - Forse ha un salone!

translation.en: Maybe she invented the weave.
And you're wearin' a weave right now, and that's why I was attracted to you,
translation.it: E tu porti le extension, e per questo mi sei piaciuta,

translation.en: 'cause you remind me of the weave that my mama created!
translation.it: mi ricordi le extension create da mia madre!

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, my God, maybe my mother's a millionaire!
Well, maybe you could ask her yourself.
Her address is right here.
translation.it: Il suo indirizzo è proprio qui.

translation.en: -My-- -Look at this.
-I got a mommy. -You got a mama, baby.
-I got a mama. -Baby.
-I got a mama. -Baby.
-Hey. -[Marie laughs]
-You got a grand-mommy! -You've got a grandma!
translation.it: - Hai una nonna! - Hai una nonna!

translation.en: -But what if she doesn't wanna meet me? -How can she not wanna meet you?
translation.it: E se non volesse vedermi? Come fa a non volerti vedere?

translation.en: Now, listen, you better hurry up, or you'll miss your chance.
'Cause in a couple of weeks, you're gonna have to focus on the family you have right here.
translation.it: Tra qualche settimana dovrai pensare alla famiglia che hai qui.

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay?
Thank you.
Don't worry. I'll be back.
-Okay. -[engine turns over]
Probably in a helicopter, because, you know, my mama is ballin'!
translation.it: Probabilmente in elicottero, perché mia madre è una nababba!

translation.en: Love you! A lot!
Bye, baby! And other baby!
♪ So, whatever ♪
What do I call her?
Hey... Mom!
I... I forgive you, Mom.
Yeah, I'm not even a little bitter that you wasn't around
translation.it: Sì, un po' ti odio per la tua assenza

translation.en: for the last 38 years, you frickin' bitch!
translation.it: negli ultimi 38 anni, razza di stronza!

translation.en: I'm sorry.
It's gonna be cool. It's gonna be good. Mm-hmm.
[man] Just leave the mail on the porch!
Oh, hey!
[man] You're not our usual mailman.
No, I'm-- I'm not with the Postal Service.
translation.it: No, non sono del servizio postale.

translation.en: Sir, I am anxiously awaiting an episode of Mork & Mindy.
translation.it: Signore, aspetto con ansia l'episodio di Mork & Mindy.

translation.en: So, you leave me no choice to be somewhat rude
translation.it: Non mi lascia scelta se non essere scortese

translation.en: and say, "Please, go away!"
translation.it: e dire: "Per favore, se ne vada!"

translation.en: Who watches Mork & Mindy still?
[knocking] Sir!
Does Lynette Spellman live here?
No. And I'll say it in Spanish,
translation.it: No! E lo dico in spagnolo:

translation.en: "El no."
Then, why is "L. Spellman" on the mailbox?
translation.it: Allora perché c'è scritto "L. Spellman" sulla cassetta?

translation.en: Very well.
But she's not here.
Really? Damn it.
What do you want?
My name is Alan,
and Lynette Spellman is my mother.
translation.it: e Lynette Spellman è mia madre.

translation.en: Lynette Spellman only has one son, and his name is Russell.
translation.it: Lynette Spellman ha un solo figlio e si chiama Russell.

translation.en: Right. I have proof.
What in the quantum leap?
Give me that.
This can't be.
I'm her son!
This... This is a mistake!
Wait, you're her son?
I'm her son. That means we're brothers!
Wait. You're my brother, Russell!
translation.it: Aspetta. Tu sei mio fratello, Russel.

translation.en: No, no, no, no. No, no. Look, right there. You see that? See that?
translation.it: No, no, no. Guarda qui. Vedi? Visto?

translation.en: See that misprint? See that date there, that's my birthday.
translation.it: Un errore di stampa. Questa data è il mio compleanno.

translation.en: -And, see-- -Yeah, but that's my birthday.
translation.it: Sì, ma è il mio compleanno.

translation.en: Yeah, but that would only make sense if, in fact, you and I were... [chuckles]
translation.it: Sì, ma avrebbe senso solo se io e te fossimo...

translation.en: Twins.
We're twins.
We're twins!
Come here, bro!
This is awkward. I've never had a man hug me before.
translation.it: È imbarazzante. Nessun uomo mi aveva mai abbracciato.

translation.en: If you don't release me, I'm gonna be forced to use my warning whistle Mother gave me.
translation.it: Se non mi lasci, dovrò usare il fischietto che mi ha dato la mamma.

translation.en: Okay, I warned you.
-[whistles] -All right, shh, shh! Hey! -Stranger danger! Stranger danger! -[dogs barking]
translation.it: - Va bene. - Un estraneo! Un estraneo! Aiuto!

translation.en: Can we... Can we go inside?
Don't touch anything with your measly hands. Everything here is very valuable.
translation.it: Non toccare niente con quelle manacce. Qui è tutto di valore.

translation.en: These are antiques, especially the TV Guide, so it's gonna be worth billions one day.
translation.it: Sono d'antiquariato, specie la guida TV. Varranno miliardi un giorno.

translation.en: Well, here's some more news.
-You're about to be an uncle. -Phooey.
-Uncle Russell. -That's a terrible name.
-Has a little ring to it. -Sounds like a cheesy morning disc jockey.
translation.it: Suona bene. Sembra il DJ di un programma idiota.

translation.en: This is the family home, huh?
Yeah. Jealous? [chuckles]
I still can't believe
translation.it: Non posso credere di essere qui

translation.en: that I'm standing here with my very own twin.
translation.it: Non posso credere di essere qui con il mio gemello.

translation.en: [Russell] Me neither.
I mean, look at us.
We look exactly alike.
Yeah, we... We look almost...
exactly... nothing alike.
No, we look exactly, exactly alike.
It's like I'm looking at myself in the mirror.
translation.it: È come se mi guardassi allo specchio.

translation.en: It's uncanny!
Same face, same hairline. Well, I'm a lot more handsome.
translation.it: Stessa faccia, stessa attaccatura. Beh, io sono molto più bello.

translation.en: That's why I got the beauty marks and you don't. [chuckles]
translation.it: Ho pure le voglie e tu no.

translation.en: So, Russell, I... take it you still live here.
translation.it: Allora, Russell... Deduco che abiti ancora qui.

translation.en: [scoffs] That's a rather obvious observation.
Why else would I have my very own cereal bowl with my name written on it?
translation.it: Perché avrei la scodella di cereali con sopra il mio nome?

translation.en: -See? -Yeah.
It's so good. I love cereal. [slurps]
translation.it: Che buoni. Adoro i cereali. Mi danno...

translation.en: Well, that's something me and you have in common.
translation.it: È una cosa che abbiamo in comune.

translation.en: I like cereal, too.
I'm more of a Wheat Chex guy myself.
I'm sorry, Alan. I like my cereals to be edible.
translation.it: Scusa, ma mi piacciono i cereali commestibili.

translation.en: Preferably with the fruit-forward complexities of the Captain's Crunchberries.
translation.it: Meglio se con le complessità fruttate dei Captain's Crunchberries.

translation.en: So, when do I see her?
-Who? -[Alan] Mom.
I-I mean, Lynette.
When does she get back?
Uh... that's... that's rather hard to say.
Oh, I got so much stuff to ask her.
translation.it: Oh, ho così tanto da chiederle.

translation.en: I mean, so many things I wanna tell her, like I'm married,
translation.it: Così tanto da dirle. Sono sposato,

translation.en: she's gonna be a grandma.
Uh, she's dead!
You said what?
Yeah, you know...
I regret to inform you...
Lynette Spellman has passed on.
How?
Car accident. I told her she should check her brakes.
translation.it: Incidente con l'auto. Le avevo detto di controllare i freni.

translation.en: So she got up under that 1986 Honda Civic SE.
translation.it: Così si è messa sotto la Honda Civic SE del 1986.

translation.en: It was blue.
Periwinkle, to be exact.
She was just that type of gal,
real hands-on and cheap as the day is long.
translation.it: si sporcava le mani, ed era spilorcia.

translation.en: Obviously, I couldn't do it for her.
Because of your size?

translation.it: Che cosa? Perché sembrava un favore.

translation.en: Oh, no. Just... just a gesture, a kind gesture on your part.
translation.it: No. Solo un gesto gentile da parte tua.

translation.en: Well, if you're askin' me for a favor, I'd like to hear it.
translation.it: Vorrei sentirlo, se me lo stai chiedendo.

translation.en: As a favor to me, would you ask her to back off, Alan?
I got you.
Hey, Alan! Quick, come here!
Baby Pete wants to say "hi" to his niece. And you could say "hi" to your kidney.
translation.it: Baby Pete vuole salutare la nipotina. E tu puoi salutare il tuo rene.

translation.en: Come on, bring that little nappyhead baby on over here!
translation.it: Dai, porta qui quella piccola afro!

translation.en: Oh, leave that baby alone.
-All right, I'm comin', I'm comin'! -Wait, wait, let me... Let me hold her.
-Give my regards to Peter. -Hi, Pee-pee!
Hey, Pee-pee.
Aw, man, she got my face.
translation.it: Oh, ha il mio stesso viso.

translation.en: Yeah, and your height.
Are you drinking with my kidney?
Oh, get over it, Alan. You ain't gettin' it back!
translation.it: Non pensarci più. Non te lo ridò.

translation.en: I'mma take it back.
Oh, you got to find me first!
I know exactly where he's at. His coordinates are right here.
translation.it: So dov'è. Ci sono le coordinate.

translation.en: I've a drone in the area. Want me to send in a strike?
translation.it: Ho un drone lì. Vuoi che lo lanci?

translation.en: -I will, I could do it. -Hey, Mama.
Oh, my Lord.
Is that my Baby Pete?
Hey, Mama!
Got all my babies together at the same time?
translation.it: Tutti i miei piccoli assieme nello stesso momento?

translation.en: Oh, Lord heard my prayer. [sniffles]
I went to church Sunday through Wednesday for this moment.
translation.it: Sono andata a messa da domenica a mercoledì.

translation.en: [all] Mama! Mama!
Mama's good now. Mama's good. I'm just overwhelmed with emotion.
translation.it: Sto bene. Sono solo sopraffatta dalle emozioni.

translation.en: If she dies, I get the jewelry.
translation.it: Se muore, i gioielli a me.

translation.en: She's just feelin' the spirit of the Lord.
I'm gettin' emotional here. [sniffles]
Family photo time, y'all!
If it's not on the 'Gram, it's a scam!
translation.it: Se non è su Instagram, non è reale!

translation.en: Now, come on, babies. Come on.
Ow! Thank you.
What'd you hit me for?
It's not nice. I'm tellin' Mother.
translation.it: Non è carino. Lo dico alla mamma.

translation.en: Mother! Ethan hit me!
I hate having brothers and sisters.
I want to be an only child again!
Bring it on in, fam. Bring it on in.
Russell, Russell, pay attention.
I want to see everybody in there. Miss Lynette, bring it in.
translation.it: Voglio vedervi tutti. Sig.na Lynette, venga.

translation.en: This reminds me of the school picture episode of Eight Is Enough
translation.it: Come l'episodio della Famiglia Bradford dove un giovane...

translation.en: -where a young Nicholas Bradford-- -[all] Shut the hell up!
translation.it: Come l'episodio della Famiglia Bradford dove un giovane... - Piantala, Russell! - Piantala!

translation.en: Hush!
You shut up.
Not you, Mom.
Okay, on three, two, one...
-Family! -[blows raspberry]
